alert.note: Alert for Castro; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:07PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Castro and Swisher Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 407 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms extended along a line from 4 miles southeast of Happy to 11 miles north of Hart. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tulia, Happy, Vigo Park and Nazareth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
